content.raw:
Ok that begs a questions that has been asked a few times before but now may need more clarification.

After pressing the button the door opens quite slowly. It is valid to assist the door in opening with a push or running into the door? Assuming you can do so without falling down. 

The previous issues around this implied that it was acceptable. But you now stating that the only valid way to open the door is by pressing the button raises the question again.

-aric

Ok that begs a questions that has been asked a few times before but now may need more clarification.

After pressing the button the door opens quite slowly. It is valid to assist the door in opening with a push or running into the door? Assuming you can do so without falling down.

The previous issues around this implied that it was acceptable. But you now stating that the only valid way to open the door is by pressing the button raises the question again.

-aric
